package: Nexus COS - Complete THIIO Handoff Package

contents.services: 52+ services (AI, Auth, Banking/BLAC, OTT, DSP, Ride-sharing/Nexus, E-commerce/Nuki, V-Suite, Core)

contents.license_service: Self-hosted license service with offline support, runtime checks, update gating
contents.documentation: 92+ documentation files (architecture, operations, service catalogs, module catalogs, frontend guides)
contents.scripts: Build, test, deploy, migration, validation, K8s generation, env templates, RTX enablement

note: Complete Nexus COS THIIO Handoff including 52+ services, 43 modules, 12 family/urban platforms, Unreal/RTX, full docs, license integration, infrastructure, and scripts.
